content.text: Match ends, Roma 3, Chelsea 0.
Second Half ends, Roma 3, Chelsea 0.
Offside, Chelsea. David Luiz tries a through ball, but Michy Batshuayi is caught offside.
Foul by Lorenzo Pellegrini (Roma).
David Luiz (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Daniele De Rossi.
Substitution, Roma. Lorenzo Pellegrini replaces Diego Perotti.
Attempt blocked. Pedro (Chelsea) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Eden Hazard.
Attempt saved. Daniel Drinkwater (Chelsea) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Willian.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Juan Jesus.
Attempt blocked. Pedro (Chelsea) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Eden Hazard.
Attempt missed. Eden Hazard (Chelsea) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Willian.
Corner,  Roma. Conceded by Thibaut Courtois.
Attempt saved. Kostas Manolas (Roma) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Radja Nainggolan with a cross.
Corner,  Roma. Conceded by Thibaut Courtois.
Attempt saved. Radja Nainggolan (Roma) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Gerson.
Substitution, Roma. Kostas Manolas replaces Alessandro Florenzi.
Substitution, Chelsea. Michy Batshuayi replaces Álvaro Morata.
Substitution, Roma. Gerson replaces Stephan El Shaarawy.
Attempt missed. Edin Dzeko (Roma) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Radja Nainggolan.
Alessandro Florenzi (Roma) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Marcos Alonso (Chelsea).
Substitution, Chelsea. Daniel Drinkwater replaces Cesc Fàbregas.
Attempt missed. Diego Perotti (Roma) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Edin Dzeko.
Edin Dzeko (Roma) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Antonio Rüdiger (Chelsea).
Goal!  Roma 3, Chelsea 0. Diego Perotti (Roma) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Aleksandar Kolarov.
Attempt missed. Álvaro Morata (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Eden Hazard.
Substitution, Chelsea. Willian replaces Gary Cahill.
Aleksandar Kolarov (Roma) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Pedro (Chelsea).
Attempt missed. Edin Dzeko (Roma) left footed shot from the left side of the box is too high. Assisted by Stephan El Shaarawy.
Offside, Chelsea. Cesc Fàbregas tries a through ball, but Álvaro Morata is caught offside.
Foul by Juan Jesus (Roma).
Álvaro Morata (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Offside, Roma. Daniele De Rossi tries a through ball, but Diego Perotti is caught offside.
Daniele De Rossi (Roma) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Pedro (Chelsea).
Foul by Eden Hazard (Chelsea).
Alessandro Florenzi (Roma) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Edin Dzeko (Roma) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Diego Perotti with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Roma. Conceded by Cesc Fàbregas.
Attempt blocked. Aleksandar Kolarov (Roma) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Edin Dzeko.
Second Half begins Roma 2, Chelsea 0.
First Half ends, Roma 2, Chelsea 0.
Attempt missed. Tiemoué Bakayoko (Chelsea) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Alisson.
Attempt saved. Marcos Alonso (Chelsea) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Eden Hazard.
Offside, Chelsea. César Azpilicueta tries a through ball, but Álvaro Morata is caught offside.
Aleksandar Kolarov (Roma) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by César Azpilicueta (Chelsea).
Goal!  Roma 2, Chelsea 0. Stephan El Shaarawy (Roma) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Radja Nainggolan with a through ball.
Corner,  Roma. Conceded by Marcos Alonso.
Attempt saved. Stephan El Shaarawy (Roma) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Edin Dzeko.
Offside, Roma. Kevin Strootman tries a through ball, but Diego Perotti is caught offside.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Eden Hazard (Chelsea) because of an injury.
Attempt blocked. Cesc Fàbregas (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Foul by Kevin Strootman (Roma).
Tiemoué Bakayoko (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Álvaro Morata (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Pedro.

Álvaro Morata (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Federico Fazio (Roma).
Offside, Chelsea. Pedro tries a through ball, but Eden Hazard is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Radja Nainggolan (Roma) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Kevin Strootman.
Foul by Cesc Fàbregas (Chelsea).
Daniele De Rossi (Roma) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt saved. Eden Hazard (Chelsea) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas with a through ball.
Gary Cahill (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Edin Dzeko (Roma).
Goal!  Roma 1, Chelsea 0. Stephan El Shaarawy (Roma) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Edin Dzeko with a headed pass.
Attempt saved. Pedro (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Tiemoué Bakayoko.
First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
